name: LD39 TowerClicker
description:
A quick and dirty (just the way you like it) game that combines clicker and tower defense for Ludum Dare 39.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/towerclicker

- Turrets will use energy each time they fire.
- Click on the turrets to charge them with energy.
- Turrets without energy will not fire!
- Turrets will fire slightly faster with high charge.
